thread.section_title: Speke Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome experience at speke and Memorable stayed..!
thread.title_full: Awesome experience at speke and Memorable stayed..! - Review of Speke Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Raj B
title: Awesome experience at speke and Memorable stayed..!
text:
‚úçA beautiful and a lovely place to stay at speke hotel. I would like to thank to all the team of speke hotel for their good customer care and kindness.
A big thanks to Mr. Bhupendar singh for everything he is so kind.
Special thanks to all breakfast team and Manager Mr. John.
Me and my family enjoyed lot and we ll come back again to stay here.
This is very convenient hotel to do whatever you want around Kampala.
I would like to suggest to all travellers kindly go through TripAdvisor to see online reviews and book right place to stay as one of my brother told me to stay at speke if you are going to Kampala.
Yeh one more thing I would like to say this hotel has 3 Authentic Restaurants and all has very good tasty and yummy food.
Once again thank you very much to entire speke team.
Good Luck for your best service.
